[data-ref=groupCombo].title: Event grouping
[data-ref=groupCombo].content: Group events by field value into different bands inside the row

[data-ref=layoutFnButton].title: Manual layout
[data-ref=layoutFnButton].content: Position events manually inside the row

.b-sch-event-wrap[data-event-id=\"3\"].title: Stacked by default
.b-sch-event-wrap[data-event-id=\"3\"].content: Overlapping events are stacked on top of each other, making the resource row grow in height to fit all events

[data-ref=packButton].title: Pack
[data-ref=packButton].content: Try packing, which makes overlapping events shrink to fit into a fixed row height

[data-ref=noneButton].title: Overlap
[data-ref=noneButton].content: Try overlap, which lets events overlap and thus does not affect their height or the rows
